column4: My Windows machine has completely died.  I have booted into Ubuntu from the CD.  Bizarrely I cannot eject the CD.  Is there a reason for this?
It is also unable to mount volume?
ubuntu doesn't provide the option to load to ram by default. The only livecd i can remember off the top of my head would be backtrack that does this, but I don't really use many livecds ; )
